item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

item.title: [UK1][Workflow Management] - Mistral
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 1, 13:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jan 5, 23:32 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 01/02/2023 13:00 UTC 
End time : 01/02/2023 16:00 UTC 
Service impact : All mistral endpoints of WAW1 will be unreachable for 5 minutes
Service improvement :As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will migrate Mistral to a new production platform

item.title: [GRA9][Public Cloud] - Octavia product
item.description:
Jan 10, 10:48 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/01/2023 9:32 UTC
End Time : 10/01/2023 9:32 UTC
Impacted Services : Octavia and Barbican endpoint were unreachable for 10 min on GRA9
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [DE1][Workflow Management] - Mistral
item.description:
Jan 9, 23:17 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 09/01/2023 20:14 UTC
End Time : 09/01/2023 22:23 UTC
Root cause : Some Mistral endpoints were experiencing some trouble with replication following a recent migration.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 9, 22:02 UTC
Identified - Our teams do everything necessary to restore the service as quickly as possible.

Jan 9, 20:28 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jan 9, 20:28 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 09/01/2023 20:14 UTC
Service impact : Some mistral endpoints of DE1 are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Investigating

item.title: [Global][Managed Kubernetes Service] - Managed Kubernetes clusters v1.22 delivery disabled
item.description:
Jan 9, 10:10 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 9, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 21, 22:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/01/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 09/01/2023 18:00 UTC 
Service impact : Delivery and reset of Managed Kubernetes clusters v1.22 disabled
Ongoing actions : Following our end-of-support policy, the Managed Kubernetes Service team will mark as deprecated the Kubernetes version 1.22. It will no longer be possible to create Managed Kubernetes clusters under the 1.22 version, or to reset existing clusters into this version. For more details, please refer to these documentations:
https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/eos-eol-policies/
https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/kubernetes-plugins-software-versions-reserved-resources/
